column5: Anyone fish in this area. I'm interested in information on a Lake called Nine Mile and another called Devlin. Or any lakes nearby that you may have fished.

fished both places for many years,I think devlin is the best--rapalas(orange and pearch)La,e is pretty good size and subject to some pretty rough water when weather gets bad,but lots of islands to take shelter on. we stay at Le vacationeer just out of town,michel has 8 cabins on Sand lake/vee lake. Nine mile takes a couple of hours to get to with one portage/sleusway but no problem to get to if water is upat all.
